name: WebGLRenderingContext.isContextLost
description: The WebGLRenderingContext.isContextLost() method returns a Boolean indicating whether or not the WebGL context has been lost and must be re-established before rendering can resume.

refs.name: WebGL 1.0
refs.description: The definition of 'WebGLRenderingContext.isContextLost' in the 'WebGL 1.0' specification.
